data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: This is a black and white picture. As we can see from the picture, an adult Asian man is sitting in a chair outside of a restaurant. He has short black hair and is wearing a T-shirt and a pair of black trousers. Apparently, he is playing games on his phone as he is holding his mobile phone with both of his hands and using both of his thumbs to touch the screen. Beside him, there is a big board on which several dishes were displayed. In the background, a large number of tables and chairs are placed inside the room. (101字)
